<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/api/projects/{projectId}/conversations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Requires permission **ConversationList**. Lists conversations for a project.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Project ID","in":"path","name":"projectId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
